Key Match Events: Ecuador doubled their lead via a Kendry Paez penalty kick just before halftime after a handball by Gregory Leigh.
Alan Minda killed off the contest in the 91st minute with a goal from a classic counter-attack.
Jamaica halved the deficit shortly after halftime, scoring their first-ever Copa America goal in their eighth match in the tournament.
Post-Match Reflections: Ecuador's victory gave them their first points of the tournament, moving them level on three each with Mexico and Venezuela.
Jamaica lost their opener to Mexico and must now win their final group game against Venezuela to have any hope of advancing.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ecuador beat Jamaica to keep Copa America's hopes alive.
Jamaica's goalkeeper Jahmali Waite failed to stop a penalty goal by Ecuador's midfielder Kendry Paez.
